relevant_findings.echocardiography_findings: Echodense aortic valve with a definite echodense lesion (size: 0.9 cm x 0.9 cm), jet of aortic regurgitation

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Transesophageal echocardiography changed from alesion at the junction of the right and left coronary cusps to a perforated left coronary cusp with an aortic root abscess.
